roleset.name: aim too far, exceed
roleset.note: OVERSHOOT-V, OVERSHOOTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia.

example.name: overshoot-v
example.text: However , while donning socks noticed he overshot his foot , may have some lingering depth perception deficits .

example.name: overshooting-n
example.text: In playing over the board his love of combination was so great as to lead occasionally to his overshooting the mark
